channel.title: Rs2 -rsc
channel.description:
If someone made a rs2 server like a rsClassic one would you play it? I mean the graphic isn't bad.
Just a suggestion might be just silly but would you?

item.title: Rs2 -rsc
item.dc:creator: @Nemesis1 Nemesis-
item.description:
@Nemesis1 wrote:

Sorry for wall of text, but snoopys stupidness is annoying me.

[quote=“snoopy89, post:14, topic:349872”][quote author=Rawr monster cookies link=topic=446247.msg3275330#msg3275330 date=1279496084]

who cares where you been probably wanking in you closet. your a computer geek and your been injail for it(Unless you trying to be “cool” by lying about it). I seen you ugly face and by that look you can’t be seen outside the house sooo excuse me for thinking you never outside.

And now you qouted me thats so cute, want a cookie “Rawr monster”?
[/quote]Hows your life been recently? have you got a job have you got a girlfriend, house and a car in the past few months?

Heres the thing snoopy you do nothing for this community just sit here and make worthless threads and posts. you wouldn’t no what to do if a nigger sat down and taught you.

Rant over still no.

Hey my life been so awesome this summer.

Lets do the check
Car = Not allowed due to crimes.
Jobb = yes.
girlfriend = Im fine with my bitches, means I don’t want a girlfriend.

Who cares about what I do for the community, people are glad that im not like you hacking rscangel and rscemu/beyond. So I know you have like 500 mopar accounts so you want to come back here? seriously are you that desperat? Your a pathatic!

And no I can’t judge anyone, I don’t know them. but if they start arguementing I will throw what I know about them in their face, as thay would do the same!

BTW; Tell me something you’ve done latly that someone uses right now? All I seen is fucking useless shit in the showoff section.

@ xEnt, Well lets take darkquest for exemple, that client was nothing like rsc but people played it, so why not give it a shot. it seems like rs2 only is partly rewritten, So i can see why that complicates it.

darkquest was still completely rsc, a few interface edits does not change it much

Sure it was but the client didn’t look anything like rsc, but im sure that didn’t take the rsc feeling away so.
And it wasn’t just a few interface edits, the client look more like a rs2 client then a rsc.[/quote]
You sure have a life, pathetic life. I mean being a player, and doing crimes, flaming on moparscape trying to make yourself look so damn cool, You sure are a cool guy irl, NOT. youre pathetic.

[quote=“snoopy89, post:8, topic:349872”][quote author=KO9 link=topic=446247.msg3275065#msg3275065 date=1279482121]
Over RSC? Yes. But I wouldn’t play either tbh.
[/quote]

Thank you finaly a decent anwser.

It does “look” better. the wierdest thing is that people already are inplanting rs2 stuff.

rune crafting = rs2.
slayer = rs2.
clan system = rs2 ideas.

theres more but I don’t keep it all in’mind.

@ xEnt, Well lets take darkquest for exemple, that client was nothing like rsc but people played it, so why not give it a shot. it seems like rs2 only is partly rewritten, So i can see why that complicates it.[/quote]
Clan system isn’t from RS2…[quote=“snoopy89, post:3, topic:349872”][quote author=Rawr monster cookies link=topic=446247.msg3275044#msg3275044 date=1279481076]
And you call yourself a loyal rsc player! GTFO THIS SECTION FOOL
[/quote]

Lol turkish idiot first of all you probably done more rs2 shit then rsclassic so stand currect.
second, I never been loyal to rsc I have a life you fool.
third , RSC is dead so you have to think outside the box. its like your room you are there 24/7 because you don’t have a rreal life, but sometimes you need to step out to go to the bathroom.[/quote]
You really think people in moparscape don’t have life?
Mark gore has a great life tbh. I’ve stalked him on facebook few times.
So do I, Can’t say same at you.
Just leave or keep your mouth shut, you aren’t making any valid statements.

Ontopic: Worst idea ever, no wonder why, you came up with it.

Read full topic

item.title: Rs2 -rsc
item.dc:creator: @KO9 KO9
item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

[quote=“snoopy89, post:22, topic:349872”][quote author=KO9 link=topic=446247.msg3276332#msg3276332 date=1279558912]

Just to go off on a slight tangent here. To everyone who doesn’t like RS2 due to the graphics when it came out, have you actually seen them now? I don’t know how anyone can’t like the HD graphics. The only fault I have with them is that the player models still look fucking gay, but given someone with a bit of milkshake 3D experience, could turn into really decent models.

if some 1 in the rsc community can pull of a rsc rs2 switch and fix that homo ass look they probably make a shit load of money think all you guys should get to gather and have a lil talk about the rsc world?
and snoop i posted the same shit u nab lol

I did try and rope xent, pets and stork into doing it a while back but obviously nothing got done. I tried doing it myself a few times but I could never even get a HD client to connect to the server, don’t know wtf was wrong but if I can get around that I’d look into doing it again.
[/quote]

that should be the smallest problem xD.
But anyway don’t use HD client, the first rs2 was the best I belive they call it 316 or something.[/quote]

I only really want to run a HD server. All of the HD clients are crap ‘releases’ though

Read full topic

item.title: Rs2 -rsc
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

if i had good knowledge of the RS2 client i would remove the (stab, jab and all that other combat-shit) and put in the fight modes. remove all of the crap items and just have the full rune set, full addy etc, id bring back weapon aim/power, remove running in wilderness and add 3 hit style.

even then i’m not sure if people would play it.

Read full topic
